name: Stellaris Starter Pack
description:
Stellaris is the ultimate sci-fi grand strategy game from Paradox Development Studio, which allows you to take your personalized empire on its first steps into a new galaxy and spread your empire – by diplomacy or by force.

If you’ve ever felt the call of traversing distant stars, now is the time to dive in with the Stellaris Starter Pack. Whether your prime directive is to boldly explore new frontiers or carve a vengeful warpath to galactic domination, your new empire awaits.

Whichever you choose, you’ll be well-prepared with this beginner’s bundle which, along with the base game, includes:

Stellaris: Utopia
For those who believe we can aspire to more, this enlightenment-oriented pack focuses on evolving your society for a brighter, more glorious future.

Stellaris: Apocalypse
For the the planet-killer in all of us, this destruction-themed update includes a veritable armada of offensive and defensive options to wield against pirates, planets, and more.

Stellaris: Leviathans Story Pack
For those that feel bigger is better, this monster story pack includes massive space beings known as Guardians to investigate and/or fight.

Stellaris: Synthetic Dawn Story Pack
For those that welcome our new AI overlords, this superior story pack includes a new playable Machine Empire and the rise of the oppressed synths in the galaxy.
